intro: Exbucklandia tonkinensis, commonly known as the Vietnamese camellia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Theaceae. Its flowers, which bloom in winter and early spring, come in a range of colors including red, pink, and white. The botanical features of Exbucklandia tonkinensis make it a valuable ornamental plant in subtropical and tropical gardens.
